text: Tamás Nádas (20 March 1969 - 7 March 2014) was a Hungarian aerobatics pilot and world champion air racer. He was born in Kiskunlacháza, Hungary. Nádas was killed when his plane crashed during an inverted (upside down) flyover at the Al Khor Airport in Al Khor, Qatar. He was 44 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Aerobatic pilots Category:Hungarian sportspeople
title: Tamás Nádas
